ISSUE.TITLE: --log-opt fails to parse tag
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description This works and shows the label properly: ``` $ podman inspect ubuntu --format '{{index .Config.Labels "org.opencontainers.image.ref.name" }}' ubuntu ``` Running: ``` $ podman run --rm -it --log-opt 'tag={{index .Config.Labels "org.opencontainers.image.ref.name" }}' ubuntu echo 33 ``` fails with: ``` Error: invalid argument "tag={{index .Config.Labels \"org.opencontainers.image.ref.name\" }}" for "--log-opt" flag: parse error on line 1, column 29: bare " in non-quoted-field See 'podman run --help' ``` ### Steps to reproduce the issue Steps to reproduce the issue 1.
